title: Bugged rune pages
body:
Hello,

my rune pages have been bugged for the past few days, i have 6 pages and 3 of them arent functional, for example i choose my ap runes but it instantly changes to ad runes, and there is nothing i can do about it, i have tried using legacy client and remaking the runepages but it was all for nothing.

replies.body: I have the same problem, i noticed that it started when i didnt save the runepages. The amount of runes i put in doubled, from 9 to 18 runes. After that the rune pages got bugged.

We're investigating and tracking this issue, and might be able to resolve it through our side in the meantime.  Rename your impacted runes, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Make sure to let the specialist know what youv'e renamed them to, and we'll look into getting that fixed for you.  See you there!
Same here for over a month
